content.raw: I intended it to be documentation for the code below.  The compositor class APIs Ogre 2.1’s [compositor script](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/api/2.1/compositor.html) is well documented compared to the class APIs. I had to dig through ogre’s src code to learn how to programmatically create the compositors so I added the script version here to save others from having to do the same when trying to understand what the code is doing..
